distributionList.option1: The prize pool is capped at 1000 IPX tokens for every $25 worth of pool created. For Instance: If $25 is deposited into the Liquidity Program for 30 days during the event period, the user is eligible to receive 1,000 IPX tokens.
distributionList.option2: The airdrop will be given to the address that was deposited while adding the liquidity.
distributionList.option3: Additionally, as a liquidity provider, you will earn 0.3% of all trading fees generated by the pool in proportion to your share of the pool.
